newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: AT&T sets NCR share pay-out at one-for-16.
newsitem.headline: AT&T sets NCR share pay-out at one-for-16.

text.p: AT&T Corp said on Thursday it had finalised the terms of its spinoff of computer unit NCR Corp and would distribute the unit's common stock to AT&T shareholders on a one-for-16 basis.

"The NCR shares will be distributed on the basis of 0.0625 of a share of NCR for each AT&T share owned. This 1 for 16 distribution will result in AT&T shareholders receiving approximately 101 million shares of NCR common stock," AT&T said in a statement released through NCR's European head office.
It said the spinoff would complete AT&T's restructuring, which has broken the firm up into three separate companies.
The 'special stock dividend' will be paid to AT&T shareholders of record on December 13. Distribution day is December 31.
AT&T said it would pay cash to holders of fewer than 16 shares.
The company announced earlier the stock distribution was exempt from U.S federal income tax. Cash payments will however be liable.
